mainBoard.flavorText:
"The East Wind, an interloper in the dominions of Westerly Weather, is an impassive-faced tyrant with a sharp poniard held behind his back for a treacherous stab."
—Joseph Conrad, *The Mirror of the Sea*

foreignData.flavorText: „Der Ostwind ist ein Eindringling im Reich des Wetters des Westens; er ist ein Tyrann mit ungerührtem Blick, der hinter dem Rücken den Dolch schon bereit zum verräterischen Stoß hält." —Joseph Conrad, Spiegel der See
foreignData.name: Luftelementar
foreignData.text: Fliegend

foreignData.flavorText: "El viento del este, un entrometido en los dominios del clima del oeste, es un tirano impasible con una daga afilada guardada en su espalda lista para una estocada traicionera." —Joseph Conrad, El espejo del mar
foreignData.name: Elemental de aire
foreignData.text: Vuela.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le Vent d'Est, un intrus dans le domaine du Temps d'Ouest, est un tyran au visage impassible et qui cache dans son dos un poignard acéré pour frapper en traître. » —Joseph Conrad, Le Miroir de la mer
foreignData.name: Élémental d'air
foreignData.text: Vol

foreignData.flavorText: "Il Vento dell'Est, un intruso nei domini del Clima di Ponente, è un tiranno dal volto impassibile, con un pugnale affilato tenuto dietro la schiena, pronto per una stilettata a tradimento." —Joseph Conrad, Lo Specchio del Mare
foreignData.name: Elementale dell'Aria
foreignData.text: Volare

foreignData.flavorText: ウェスタリーの気候の支配の中に潜り込む東風は無感情な暴君で、鋭い短剣を背中に隠し、不意の一撃を狙っている。 ――ジョゼフ・コンラッド、「海の鏡」
foreignData.name: 大気の精霊
foreignData.text: 飛行
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル

foreignData.flavorText: "O vento leste, um intruso nos domínios do tempo ocidental, é um tirano impassível segurando um afiado punhal oculto às costas para um golpe traiçoeiro." — Joseph Conrad, Espelho do Mar
foreignData.name: Elemental do Ar
foreignData.text: Voar

foreignData.flavorText: «Восточный Ветер, делающий набеги на владения Западного, тот — бесстрастный тиран и держит за спиной острый кинжал, готовясь нанести предательский удар». — Джозеф Конрад, Зеркало морей

foreignData.text: Полет

foreignData.flavorText: 「东风闯入西风时令统治区，犹如背藏利刃、面容冷漠的暴君，准备要背节行刺。」 ～约瑟夫•康拉德，《如镜的大海》

foreignData.text: 飞行

mainBoard.name: Air Elemental

mainBoard.flavorText: Some wizards compete not to summon the most interesting creatures, but to create the most interesting aftereffects when a summons goes awry.

foreignData.flavorText: Einige Zauberer wetteifern darum, wessen Kreaturen die interessantesten Nacheffekte hinterlassen, wenn die Beschwörung daneben geht.
foreignData.name: Essenzzerstäubung
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Kreaturenzauber deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Algunos hechiceros compiten no por invocar las criaturas más interesantes, sino por crear los efectos más interesantes después de que la invocación sale mal.
foreignData.name: Esparcir la esencia
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo de criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Certains sorciers concourent non pas pour invoquer les créatures les plus intéressantes, mais pour créer les effets secondaires les plus intéressants quand une invocation tourne mal.
foreignData.name: Dispersion d'essence
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort de créature ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni maghi si sfidano non a evocare le creature più interessanti, ma a creare i più interessanti effetti collaterali quando un'evocazione impazzisce.
foreignData.name: Disperdere Essenza
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: どれだけ興味深い怪物を召喚するかではなく、召喚が間違った方向に行ったときにどれだけ興味深い結果が起こるかを競う魔術師もいる。
foreignData.name: 本質の散乱
foreignData.text: クリーチャー呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.flavorText: Alguns magos competem não para invocar as criaturas mais interessantes, mas para criar os efeitos colaterais mais interessantes quando uma invocação dá errado.
foreignData.name: Espalhar Essência
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica de criatura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Некоторые чародеи соревнуются не в том, кто вызовет самое интересное существо, а в том, кто создаст самое занимательное последействие в случае, если вызов окажется неудачным.
foreignData.name: Разлет Эссенции
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание существа.

foreignData.flavorText: 有些法师比试并非以召唤出最有趣的生物来定胜负，而是看召唤出错后会有怎样有趣的后续影响。

foreignData.text: 反击目标生物咒语。

mainBoard.name: Essence Scatter

rulings.text: A “creature spell” is any spell with the type creature, even if it has other types such as artifact or enchantment. Older cards of type summon are also creature spells.

mainBoard.flavorText:

foreignData.name: Eiskäfig
foreignData.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung
Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.
Wenn die verzauberte Kreatur das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs oder einer Fähigkeit wird, zerstöre den Eiskäfig.

foreignData.name: Jaula de hielo
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
La criatura encantada no puede atacar o bloquear, y no pueden activarse sus habilidades activadas.
Cuando la criatura encantada sea objetivo de un hechizo o habilidad, destruye la Jaula de hielo.

foreignData.name: Cage de glace
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
La créature enchantée ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.
Quand la créature enchantée devient la cible d'un sort ou d'une capacité, détruisez la Cage de glace.

foreignData.name: Gabbia di Ghiaccio
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
La creatura incantata non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.
Quando la creatura incantata diventa bersaglio di una magia o abilità, distruggi la Gabbia di Ghiaccio.

foreignData.name: 氷の牢獄
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは攻撃したりブロックしたりできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーが呪文や能力の対象になったとき、氷の牢獄を破壊する。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: Jaula Congelada
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura
A criatura encantada não pode atacar nem bloquear e suas habilidades ativadas não podem ser ativadas.
Quando a criatura encantada se tornar o alvo de uma mágica ou habilidade, destrua Jaula Congelada.

foreignData.name: Ледяная Клетка
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать существо
Зачарованное существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности нельзя активировать.
Когда зачарованное существо становится целью заклинания или способности, уничтожьте Ледяную Клетку.

foreignData.name: 寒冰槛
foreignData.text:
结附于生物
所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。
当所结附的生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，消灭寒冰槛。

mainBoard.name: Ice Cage
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

rulings.text: If the enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, Ice Cage’s ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell or ability. Ice Cage’s ability will resolve (causing Ice Cage to be destroyed) first.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Turbulenz kommt! Die Turbulenz kommt! Bindet euch fest!"
foreignData.name: In die Turbulenz hinein
foreignData.text:
Bonus {1}{U} (Du kannst zusätzlich {1}{U} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Falls die Bonuskosten von In die Turbulenz hinein bezahlt wurden, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "¡Marea de Turbulencia! ¡Marea de Turbulencia! ¡Sujétense!"
foreignData.name: Dentro de la Turbulencia
foreignData.text:
Estímulo {1}{U}. (Puedes pagar {1}{U} adicionales en cuanto lances este hechizo.)
Regresa el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra a la mano de su propietario. Si Dentro de la Turbulencia fue estimulado, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vague de Roulis ! Vague de Roulis ! Attachez-vous ! »
foreignData.name: En plein Roulis
foreignData.text:
Kick {1}{U} (Vous pouvez payer {1}{U} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Renvoyez le permanent non-terrain ciblé dans la main de son propriétaire. Si En plein Roulis a été kické, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Marea torbida! Marea torbida! Tenetevi stretti!"
foreignData.name: Nel Torbido
foreignData.text:
Potenziamento {1}{U} (Puoi pagare {1}{U} addizionale quando lanci questa magia.)
Fai tornare un permanente non terra bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario. Se Nel Torbido è stato potenziato, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「乱動の潮目だ！ 乱動の潮目だ！ どこかに身体を縛り付けろ！」
foreignData.name: 乱動への突入
foreignData.text:
キッカー {1}{U} （あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{1}{U}を支払ってもよい。）
土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。 乱動への突入がキッカーされている場合、カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "Maré de turbilhão! Maré de turbilhão! Amarrem-se ao chão!"
foreignData.name: Adentrar o Turbilhão
foreignData.text:
Reforçar {1}{U} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {1}{U} ao conjurar esta mágica.)
Devolva a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno para a mão de seu dono. Se Adentrar o Turbilhão foi reforçado, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: «Великий Вал! Великий Вал! Привязывайтесь, пока не поздно!»
foreignData.name: Навстречу Великому Валу
foreignData.text:
Усилитель {1}{U} (Вы можете заплатить дополнительно {1}{U} при разыгрывании этого заклинания.)
Верните целевой не являющийся землей перманент в руку его владельца. Если Навстречу Великому Валу получило Усилитель, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 「狂搅潮！ 是狂搅潮！ 快把自己扎紧！」
foreignData.name: 没入狂搅
foreignData.text:
增幅{1}{U} （你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{U}。)
将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。 如果没入狂搅已增幅，抓一张牌。

mainBoard.name: Into the Roil
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Into the Roil was kicked, draw a card.

rulings.text: If the targeted permanent is an illegal target by the time Into the Roil resolves, the entire spell doesn't resolve. You don't draw a card.

An ability that triggers when a player casts a kicked spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger, but after targets have been chosen for that spell. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
If the target nonland permanent is an illegal target by the time Into the Roil tries to resolve, the spell doesn't resolve. You don't draw a card if it was kicked.

If you copy a kicked spell, the copy is also kicked. If a card or token enters the battlefield as a copy of a permanent that's already on the battlefield, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
Kicker represents an optional additional cost that you may choose to pay as you cast the spell. A spell cast with that additional cost paid is "kicked."

Some instant or sorcery spells require alternative or additional targets if they're kicked. You ignore these targeting requirements if those spells aren't kicked, and you can't kick those spells unless you can choose the appropriate targets. On the other hand, you can kick a permanent spell even if you won't be able to choose targets for an enters-the-battlefield ability of that permanent once the spell resolves.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
You can't pay a kicker cost more than once.

mainBoard.text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

地落～如果本回合中有地在你的操控下进战场，则改为抓三张牌。

mainBoard.name: Mysteries of the Deep
mainBoard.originalText:
Draw two cards.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.

rulings.text: Having more than one land enter under your control this turn provides no additional benefit.
Once the spell resolves, having a land enter under your control provides no further benefit.
The effect of this spell's landfall ability replaces its normal effect. If you had a land enter under your control this turn, only the landfall-based effect happens.

The landfall ability checks for an action that has happened in the past. It doesn't matter if a land that entered the battlefield under your control previously in the turn is still on the battlefield, is still under your control, or is still a land.
Whether you had a land enter under your control this turn is checked as this spell resolves, not as you cast it.

mainBoard.text:
Draw two cards.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I don't need to have the perfect plan. My foe just has to have an imperfect one."
—Jace Beleren

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich muss keinen perfekten Plan haben. Es reicht, wenn der meines Gegners nicht perfekt ist." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Bann des Beschwörers
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Kreaturenzauber deiner Wahl. Bringe einen 2/2 blauen Illusion-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: "No necesito un plan perfecto. Sólo que mi oponente tenga uno imperfecto." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Ruina del invocador
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo de criatura. Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Ilusión azul 2/2.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il ne m'est pas nécessaire d'avoir le plan parfait. Il suffit que mon ennemi en ait un qui soit imparfait. » —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Fléau de l'invocateur
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort de créature ciblé. Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 2/2 bleue Illusion.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non ho bisogno del piano perfetto. Basta che il nemico ne abbia uno imperfetto." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Flagello dell'Evocatore
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia creatura bersaglio. Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Illusione 2/2 blu.

foreignData.flavorText: 「完璧な計画なんて必要ない。 敵は不完全な奴しか持ってないんだから。」 ――ジェイス・ベレレン
foreignData.name: 召喚士の破滅
foreignData.text: クリーチャー呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。 青の２/２のイリュージョン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu não preciso ter um plano perfeito. Basta que meu inimigo tenha um plano imperfeito." — Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Maldição do Invocador
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica de criatura alvo. Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura azul 2/2 do tipo Ilusão.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мне не нужен идеальный план. Мне нужно, чтобы план моего врага был далеко не идеальный». — Джейс Белерен
foreignData.name: Гибель Призывателя
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание существа. Положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 синяя Иллюзия.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我不需要什么完美计划。 我的敌人已有了个不完美的。」 ～杰斯贝连
foreignData.name: 召唤师禁咒
foreignData.text: 反击目标生物咒语。 将一个2/2蓝色虚影衍生物放进战场。

mainBoard.name: Summoner's Bane
mainBoard.originalText: Counter target creature spell. Put a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If the targeted spell is an illegal target by the time Summoner’s Bane resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t get a creature token.
You get the token creature, not the controller of the creature spell.

mainBoard.text: Counter target creature spell. Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token.

foreignData.flavorText: Surrakar greifen sich Sachen, die sie nicht wollen.
foreignData.name: Surrakar-Austreiber
foreignData.text: Wenn der Surrakar-Austreiber ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine getappte Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurückbringen.

foreignData.flavorText: Los surrakar toman cosas que no quieren.
foreignData.name: Desterrador surrakar
foreignData.text: Cuando el Desterrador surrakar entre al campo de batalla, puedes regresar la criatura girada objetivo a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Les Surrakars attrapent ce qu'ils ne veulent pas.
foreignData.name: Bannisseur surrakar
foreignData.text: Quand le Bannisseur surrakar arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez renvoyer une créature engagée ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: I surrakar sanno come comportarsi con ciò che non vogliono.
foreignData.name: Esiliatore Surrakar
foreignData.text: Quando l'Esiliatore Surrakar entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi far tornare una creatura TAPpata bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: サラカーが手にするのは、やつらが欲しがらない物だ。
foreignData.name: サラカーの消し去り
foreignData.text: サラカーの消し去りが戦場に出たとき、タップ状態のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたはそれをオーナーの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — サラカー

foreignData.flavorText: Os surrakar pegam as coisas que não querem.
foreignData.name: Banidor Surrakar
foreignData.text: Quando Banidor Surrakar entra no campo de batalha, você pode devolver a criatura virada alvo para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: Сурракары хватают то, что им не нужно.
foreignData.name: Сурракар-Гонитель
foreignData.text: Когда Сурракар-Гонитель выходит на поле битвы, вы можете вернуть целевое повернутое существо в руку его владельца.

foreignData.flavorText: 苏拉卡拿他们不要的东西。
foreignData.name: 退敌苏拉卡
foreignData.text: 当退敌苏拉卡进战场时，你可以将目标已横置的生物移回其拥有者手上。

mainBoard.name: Surrakar Banisher
mainBoard.originalText: When Surrakar Banisher enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
mainBoard.text: When Surrakar Banisher enters, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."
—Lumi, goatherd

foreignData.flavorText: „Das ist mir nur Recht. Auf der Weide gibt es kein Unkraut mehr, und die Wölfe sind alle festgefroren." —Lumi, Ziegenhirte
foreignData.name: Frostmauer
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger (Diese Kreatur kann nicht angreifen.)
Immer wenn die Frostmauer eine Kreatur blockt, enttappt diese Kreatur nicht während des nächsten Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignData.flavorText: "Me alegra su llegada. El pastizal se libra de las malezas y los lobos se congelan." —Lumi, pastora de cabras
foreignData.name: Muro de escarcha
foreignData.text:
Defensor. (Esta criatura no puede atacar.)
Siempre que el Muro de escarcha bloquee a una criatura, esa criatura no se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il est le bienvenu. Les pâturages sont débarrassés des mauvaises herbes et les loups sont gelés. » —Lumi, chevrière
foreignData.name: Mur de gel
foreignData.text:
Défenseur (Cette créature ne peut pas attaquer.)
À chaque fois que le Mur de gel bloque une créature, cette créature ne se dégage pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.flavorText: "Mi fa molto piacere. I pascoli sono privi di erbacce e i lupi sono congelati." —Lumi, pastorella
foreignData.name: Muro di Gelo
foreignData.text:
Difensore (Questa creatura non può attaccare.)
Ogniqualvolta il Muro di Gelo blocca una creatura, quella creatura non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignData.flavorText: 「大歓迎ですよ。 牧地の雑草は無くなるし、狼も凍り固まっちゃうんですから。」 ――ヤギ飼いのルミ
foreignData.name: 霜の壁
foreignData.text:
防衛 （このクリーチャーは攻撃できない。）
霜の壁がいずれかのクリーチャーをブロックするたび、そのブロックされたクリーチャーはそれのコントローラーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。

foreignData.flavorText: "Sua chegada me alegrou. O pasto está livre de ervas daninhas e os lobos estão congelados." —Lumi, pastor de cabras
foreignData.name: Barreira Congelada
foreignData.text:
Defensor (Esta criatura não pode atacar.)
Toda vez que Barreira Congelada bloqueia uma criatura, aquela criatura não desvira durante a próxima etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.

foreignData.flavorText: «А мне так даже нравится. На пастбище не осталось сорняков, а волки превратились в ледышки». — Луми, пастушка коз
foreignData.name: Стена Инея
foreignData.text:
Защитник (Это существо не может атаковать.)
Каждый раз, когда Стена Инея блокирует существо, то существо не разворачивается во время следующего шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.

foreignData.flavorText: 「它来得好。 牧野没了杂草，狼也给冻成冰块。」 ～山羊牧人卢美
foreignData.name: 霜墙
foreignData.text:
守军 （此生物不能攻击。）
每当霜墙阻挡生物时，该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

mainBoard.name: Wall of Frost
mainBoard.originalText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

rulings.text: If the creature isn’t tapped during its controller’s next untap step (perhaps because it was untapped by a spell), Wall of Frost’s ability has no effect at that time. It won’t try to keep the creature tapped on subsequent turns.

Wall of Frost’s ability tracks the creature, not the creature’s controller. That is, if the creature changes controllers before its first controller’s next untap step, then it won’t untap during its new controller’s next untap step.

mainBoard.text:
Defender
Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
